WRITING.TITLE: I am overwhelmed with mods for SoC, please help!
WRITING.TEXT:
The way I understand there are several of them that are complete overhaul and better than the vanilla, by far.
I just have no clue where to start, SoC:Complete and Stalkersoup seem to be mentioned a lot, but they seem to get a lot of criticism too.
Personally I would like mods with good gunplay and realistic not CHALLENGING enemies, what that means is, I do not want to get headshoted by a shotgun 100m away in the middle of the night. If the guns are realistically hard to shoot, I would like the enemies to obey the same laws basically.
Of course immersion, better lore friendly visuals and added content is welcomed by me too!
EDIT: I Decided to go with Autum Aurora, but it seems its crashing on "loading shaders" when I pick "Fully Dynamic Lighting"... So there's that.
EDIT2: I think I fixed it, but now I face the issue of wanting to have Russian Voice actors but with English subtitles...

I swear some visual options make almost 0% difference to me, and some that make a bit more difference, well if the game doesn't have that many cutscenes, I just do not notice them, I am too busy with the gameplay.
That usually happens in Multyplayer heavy games. But framerate on the other hand, oh boy...
